summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the coordination of document production related to financial subpoenas in the Epstein investigation. A forensic accountant from the FBI New York Field Office provides a summary of served subpoenas and arranges to deliver CDs of productions to a recipient at FBI offices.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The sender of the initial email who attached a summary of financial subpoenas served in the Epstein investigation and offers to provide CDs of productions.

events.title: Coordination for Document Production
events.description: An email exchange coordinates the handover of CDs containing productions related to financial subpoenas in the Epstein case, to occur at FBI offices.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

keyFacts: Financial subpoenas were served as part of the Epstein investigation, with a summary prepared by an FBI forensic accountant.
Document production involved burning copies to CDs for transfer, indicating a physical exchange of evidence.
Coordination for evidence handover was scheduled for a Thursday at FBI offices in October 2019.
